Package io.dimeformat.keyring

Enum Class IntegrityState

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<IntegrityState>
io.dimeformat.keyring.IntegrityState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<IntegrityState>, Constable
public enum IntegrityState extends Enum<IntegrityState>
Holds the result from an item verification, i.e. using Item.verify() or related methods.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    COMPLETE
    All parts of the DiME item was successfully verified and the item may be trusted.
    FAILED_DATE_MISMATCH
    The dates set in the DiME item verified are incorrect, where the issued at date ("iat") is after the expiration date ("exp").
    FAILED_INTERNAL_FAULT
    Verification encountered an unexpected internal error which could not be recovered from.
    FAILED_INVALID_KEY_RING_ITEM
    An invalid item was encountered in the key ring, so verification could not be completed.
    FAILED_ISSUER_MISMATCH
    The issuer ID ("iss") in the DiME identity used when verifying does not match issuer ID ("iss") set in the item verified.
    FAILED_KEY_MISMATCH
    The public key used to verify the DiME item does not match the key pair used to generate the digital signature.
    FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_FAULT
    One, or several, linked items could not be verified successfully.
    FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISMATCH
    Provided item list to verify linked items contains additional, non-linked, items.
    FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISSING
    No linked items found when verifying with a provided item list.
    FAILED_NO_KEY_RING
    There are no keys or identities stored in the key rings, so verification could not be done.
    FAILED_NO_SIGNATURE
    Unable to verify the digital signature, as the DiME item did not contain a signature.
    FAILED_NOT_TRUSTED
    The digital signature could not be successfully verified, and, thus the DiME item must not be trusted.
    FAILED_USED_AFTER_EXPIRED
    The expiration date ("exp") set in the DiME item verified has passed, and the item should no longer be used.
    FAILED_USED_BEFORE_ISSUED
    The issued at date ("iat") set in the DiME item has not yet passed, and the item should not be used yet.
    INTACT
    All verified parts of the DiME item was successful.
    PARTIALLY_COMPLETE
    All parts of the DiME item was successfully verified.
    PARTIALLY_VALID_ITEM_LINKS
    All linked items where verified successfully against a provided item list.
    VALID_DATES
    The dates (issued at and/or expires at) in the DiME item were verified successfully.
    VALID_ITEM_LINKS
    Any linked items where verified successfully against a provided item list.
    VALID_SIGNATURE
    The signature of the DiME item was verified successfully.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • COMPLETE

      public static final IntegrityState COMPLETE
      All parts of the DiME item was successfully verified and the item may be trusted.

    • PARTIALLY_COMPLETE

      public static final IntegrityState PARTIALLY_COMPLETE
      All parts of the DiME item was successfully verified. However, not all linked items where verified, although, those that where was successful.

    • INTACT

      public static final IntegrityState INTACT
      All verified parts of the DiME item was successful. However, some parts where skipped, like linked items as no list of items where provided.

    • VALID_SIGNATURE

      public static final IntegrityState VALID_SIGNATURE
      The signature of the DiME item was verified successfully. No other parts where verified.

    • VALID_DATES

      public static final IntegrityState VALID_DATES
      The dates (issued at and/or expires at) in the DiME item were verified successfully. No other parts where verified.

    • VALID_ITEM_LINKS

      public static final IntegrityState VALID_ITEM_LINKS
      Any linked items where verified successfully against a provided item list. No items where skipped or missing. No other parts where verified.

    • PARTIALLY_VALID_ITEM_LINKS

      public static final IntegrityState PARTIALLY_VALID_ITEM_LINKS
      All linked items where verified successfully against a provided item list. Any list, linked items or provided items, may contain items not in the other list. No other parts where verified.

    • FAILED_NO_SIGNATURE

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_NO_SIGNATURE
      Unable to verify the digital signature, as the DiME item did not contain a signature.

    • FAILED_NOT_TRUSTED

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_NOT_TRUSTED
      The digital signature could not be successfully verified, and, thus the DiME item must not be trusted.

    • FAILED_KEY_MISMATCH

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_KEY_MISMATCH
      The public key used to verify the DiME item does not match the key pair used to generate the digital signature.

    • FAILED_ISSUER_MISMATCH

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_ISSUER_MISMATCH
      The issuer ID ("iss") in the DiME identity used when verifying does not match issuer ID ("iss") set in the item verified.

    • FAILED_USED_AFTER_EXPIRED

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_USED_AFTER_EXPIRED
      The expiration date ("exp") set in the DiME item verified has passed, and the item should no longer be used.

    • FAILED_USED_BEFORE_ISSUED

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_USED_BEFORE_ISSUED
      The issued at date ("iat") set in the DiME item has not yet passed, and the item should not be used yet.

    • FAILED_DATE_MISMATCH

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_DATE_MISMATCH
      The dates set in the DiME item verified are incorrect, where the issued at date ("iat") is after the expiration date ("exp").

    • FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_FAULT

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_FAULT
      One, or several, linked items could not be verified successfully.

    • FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISMATCH

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISMATCH
      Provided item list to verify linked items contains additional, non-linked, items.

    • FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISSING

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_LINKED_ITEM_MISSING
      No linked items found when verifying with a provided item list.

    • FAILED_INVALID_KEY_RING_ITEM

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_INVALID_KEY_RING_ITEM
      An invalid item was encountered in the key ring, so verification could not be completed.

    • FAILED_NO_KEY_RING

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_NO_KEY_RING
      There are no keys or identities stored in the key rings, so verification could not be done.

    • FAILED_INTERNAL_FAULT

      public static final IntegrityState FAILED_INTERNAL_FAULT
      Verification encountered an unexpected internal error which could not be recovered from.
